pullrequest.title: Added GUI plugin and config files

content.raw:
Should we draw an outline around the icon of the selected test? When I change tests, the text changes, but there's no indication in the pictures as to which test is active.

Also, it would be great if clicking "Next Test" changed to the correct tab (for example "Grasp" to "Grip") and drew an outline around the test icon and name.
content.html:
Should we draw an outline around the icon of the selected test? When I change tests, the text changes, but there's no indication in the pictures as to which test is active.

Also, it would be great if clicking "Next Test" changed to the correct tab (for example "Grasp" to "Grip") and drew an outline around the test icon and name.
